entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 early in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
